TopicTitle: How do you change a Thread name?

Articles.Content:
How do you change a Thread name?

I want to change the name of a Thread because people don't know what it is about.
It should be a matter of editing your original post and clicking on "Go Advanced" to access the advanced controls, there you should see a text box for your title.
This only changes the title of the post

Hmmm, this is strange, it seems regular users cannot change thread titles, and you should be able to, tell you what, give me the link to the thread in question and the new title you would like for it, and I will change it for you

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/14208-J-O-S-T

I would like it changed to James Orbit Space Program

You need to use the Advanced (Go Advanced button) editor to modify thread titles. The quick reply box is not full featured.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I try my best, don't forget to click the sheriff's star below the avatar of helpful Mods

If you have any further issues just PM me.

Hi!

I might just be stupid, but i can't modify the title of my threads.

I can change the title of my OP in advanced mode, but that does not update the thread title.

I searched on how to change thread titles in vBulletin in general, and doublclicking near the title

does enable me to edit; however, after pressing enter, the title does not update. I get a

"rotating star" next to the title, than nothing... i did wait a few minutes, of course.

Can someone help me out with this?

Thank you in advance,

Cheers!
